channel.title: Vps
channel.description:
hey i have a614 i hosted fo my pc now i got a vps but when i wanna run server i get a error
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i downloaded jre/jdk and java idk why it wont run this in run.bat
[/code] @echo off color d title beatsx Run java -cp bin;lib/*; org.dementhium.RS2Server pause

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The VPS doesn’t have a classpath.
Change: java -cp bin;lib/; org.dementhium.RS2Server
To: “C:\Program Files\Java\JDKVERSIONHERE\bin\java.exe”-cp bin;lib/; org.dementhium.RS2Server

Obviously change JDKVERSIONHERE to the correct version

Read full topic

hey i have a614 i hosted fo my pc now i got a vps but when i wanna run server i get a error

i downloaded jre/jdk and java idk why it wont run this in run.bat

[/code] @echo off
color d
title beatsx Run
java -cp bin;lib/*; org.dementhium.RS2Server
pause
